00022 #include <avr/sfr_defs.h>
00023 #include <avr/io.h>
00024 #include "nartos.h"
00025 
00026 #define TRUE 1
00027 #define FALSE 0
00028 
00029 /* Convenience macros (we don't use them all) */
00030 #define  _BV(bit) (1 << (bit))
00031 #define  inb(sfr) _SFR_BYTE(sfr)
00032 #define  inw(sfr) _SFR_WORD(sfr)
00033 #define  outb(sfr, val) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) = (val))
00034 #define  outw(sfr, val) (_SFR_WORD(sfr) = (val))
00035 #define  cbi(sfr, bit) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) &= ~_BV(bit))
00036 #define  sbi(sfr, bit) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) |= _BV(bit))
00037 #define  high(x) ((uint8_t) (x >> 8) & 0xFF)
00038 #define  low(x) ((uint8_t) (x & 0xFF))
00039 
00040 // Task prototypes
00041 void firstTask(void);
00042 void secondTask(void);
00043 
00044 volatile uint8_t firstTaskID  __attribute__ ((naked));
00045 volatile uint8_t secondTaskID __attribute__ ((naked));
00046 
00047 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 // The main program needs to initialise stuff and call a first task.
00049 
00050 int main(void)
00051 {
00052   initNartos();
00053   firstTaskID = taskStart((uint16_t)*firstTask,FALSE);
00054   nartos();
00055 }
00056 
00057 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 // A sample task
00059 // Toggles PORTC3 and starts a short delay task, then waits.
00060 
00061 void firstTask(void)
00062 {
00063   sbi(DDRC,3);
00064   while(TRUE)
00065   {
00066     sbi(PORTC,3);
00067     secondTaskID = taskStart((uint16_t)*secondTask,FALSE);
00068     taskWait();
00069     cbi(PORTC,3);
00070     secondTaskID = taskStart((uint16_t)*secondTask,FALSE);
00071     taskWait();
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 // Short wait task reschedules the original task at high priority and exits.
00076 void secondTask(void)
00077 {
00078   for (uint8_t count = 0; count < 100; ++count);
00079   taskSchedule(sbi(firstTaskID,7), FALSE);
00080   taskExit();
00081 }
00082 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
